description_0: A stuffed globe of the planet sitting on a wooden plank floor, the globe has 4 lines where it had been put together. Each of the continents are colored from purple, yellow, green and red, the sea is blue, and it has the names of the countries. More importantly, there are the ocean's names listed too like "NORTH / ATLANTIC / OCEAN" and "SOUTH / ATLANTIC / OCEAN."
description_1: A poster of the world map with different colored countries is at the bottom of a white wall. Above the map is a poster with the colors written in Spanish where each color word is written in the color it describes, and the colors are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, brown, black, white and grey. In the upper left corner above the world map is a red poster with yellow rectangles numbered to 6 on how to properly write a paper. A green cup filled with pens is in front of the world map next to the country Chile.
